abilities.desc: After an enemy destroys any of your Copies, you deal 1 damage to them.
abilities.trigger: after an enemy destroys any of your copies

abilities.desc: At the start of your turn and when you Bleed, place a Copy into a space within range of you or your Copies.
abilities.trigger: at the start of your turn and when you bleed

abilities.desc: At the end of your turn, you deal 1 damage to each enemy adjacent to any of your Copies.
abilities.trigger: at the end of your turn

actions.name: Hunger
actions.desc: One target within range discards 3 tokens of their choice (or all of their tokens, if they have less). For each token they discarded, place a Copy into an empty space adjacent to them.

actions.name: Raise The Dead
actions.desc: Give 2 Fatigue tokens to an enemy within range, then place 2 Copies in empty spaces adjacent to that enemy.
